nodes.text: Stormtrooper chargers were fast-moving, agile stormtroopers equipped with a stun baton and a standard set of stormtrooper armor.

The Spectres, a Lothalite rebel cell opposing the rule of the Galactic Empire, trained against these troopers of the Stormtrooper Corps with charging droids that wielded stun batons in a cave at Haven, their hideout on Lothal.
